page.title: 13Leisure and recreation
page.content: Peter Franklin{Hobbies}I like to collect coins from other countries. I put them in a folder to keep them neat. I also play the French horn. I am in several orchestras. I enjoy reading books. I like science fiction and fantasy books.My Dad plays the organ and is interested in trains. My brother plays the guitar and my mother enjoys singing.{Sport}I play badminton but I only like watching cricket and tennis.{Music}I like to listen to rock music as well as classical. Some rock groups I like are Queen, Genesis, Howard Jones and Phil Collins.
